name: Lo-Fi Loop Junky
details:
20-second lo-fi looperA 20-second analog phrase-sampling looper with very low fidelity, frequency response that cuts off at 2.6 kHz, brick-wall compression, hiss, distortion, and a warped-record vibrato feature that makes your guitar sound like an ancient radio transmission, but your direct guitar sounds especially sparkly.
https://www.zvex.com/guitar-pedals/lo-fi-loop-junky-guitar-effects-pedal
